name: European Tax Adviser Federation
goal:
Cooperation between members;
Representation of the interests of tax practitioners at European level;
Working closely with European institutions in order to promote good legislation in tax matters and professional regulations as well as in related matters;
Promotion and enhancement of quality, competencies, expertise and recognition of specializations;
Promotion of standards and sustainable regulations;
Enhancing cooperation at international level.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
New internal market strategy, European Commission, DG GROW;
Common Consolidated Corporate Tax Base Directive, CCCTB, DG TAXUD;
Tax Transparency Package, DG TAXUD;
Automatic exchange of information about cross-border tax rulings and transfer pricing arrangements;
Anti-BEPS Directive;
Financial Transaction Tax, FTT;
TAXE II - Special Committee in the European Parliament;
IMCO Committee, European Parliament
